definition: to be unable to repress sth/to be unable to contain oneself
to choke/to stifle/to restrain/to hold back/to hold in (urine)/to hold (one's breath)
(negative prefix)/not/no
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: The little boy couldn't contain his urine any longer.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩的小便急得憋不住了。

sentences.english: I am a great heart that can't keep this matter any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個心裏極其憋不住事的人。

sentences.english: I wouldn't say this to you, but now I can't help it.
sentences.chinese: 我一直忍着沒說，可再也憋不住了。

sentences.english: Honest later hold back did not live, look for a toilet to go up.
sentences.chinese: 後來實在憋不住了，找個廁所就上。

sentences.english: I won't be holding my breath.

sentences.chinese: 我只是實在憋不住了，想撒泡尿。

sentences.english: There is a passenger inside nasty, urinate urgently to diarrhea, request the driver to stop.
sentences.chinese: 有一乘客內急，實在憋不住要拉稀，請求司機停車。

sentences.english: I know how hard it is for you to hold yourself back.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你自己都快憋不住啦。
